title: Fomo
content:
I've joined through kcet round 3 and it feels like pessat classes have more chill peer group. I don't really like my class people and ik I might just be overthinking but I feel so out of place while all of my other friends have so much fun.üò≠

What can I do to copeü§ß

comments.body: With time, it shall pass
what section dude
Is there anything I can doü•≤

Join PES 28 Discord.
You'll feel better.

Its placebo,
C14 is a pessat class, ask around(I might be wrong)
If you don't like your classmates wait for Sem2 shuffle and hope you'll get better ones
I can shuffle in sem2? or year 2?
Send link
Pretty sure that after the cet kids catch up, everyone is shuffled in Sem2. (don't take my word for it but there's a shuffle eventually)
https://discord.gg/VHRYaQAe
how's this gonna helpü§ß
pessat class? they have mixed kcet 3rd round with pessat class?

Bro really?
You'll get to meet people who are willing to talk to you including myself.¬†
People on discord are chill.
Who knows you might even get your peer group there like I did.
oh thank u, hopefully I get along

I realised I just made a mistake 
There are 14 classes in each cycle , total 28
Of which I believe c12 and p12 are 2nd round
13,14 are 3rd round

Chill and chin up bro!
Happens initially, you'll eventually get along with your classmates and eventually your batchmates.
That's just a common perception which u'd have looking at cold response of ur peers to the conversations u initiate but as and when u get to interact with them it'll get better...maybe during labs or a boring class( lol ) interact with them
it's just that I'm quite bad at making friends
i can be ur pessat friend ü§∑‚Äç‚ôÇÔ∏è
Which class are you from you wanna talk
You can wait, as with time it shall pass
my classmates were giving dry replies whenever I tried to make a convoü§ß
Which sec are you in there brother

Okay cool..if it's some low self esteem type issue...maybe bcz of ur looks then consider working out, gym is a good place to make friends.
If it's some sorta language barrier then don't care much abt it  just step up and start talking.
If u have a feeling of embarrassment that's totally fine bcz once u get gelled with some1 u both will just laugh and make jokes abt your first convo.
Don't overthink much abt what the opposite person thinks bout u, be kind, be respectful and straightforward, that'll fetch u "like minded" friends!!
Even i am from cet bro u can approach me for a talk , my section is p7
It shuffles once after 1st sem and for a final time after 2nd sem.
And occasionally bleach my eyes every time I open that server

That's true tho,
I don't know how but you always come during the wrong time lmao
